summary: dbloader fails to create seed data in oracle

for example java error running dbloader java org.springframework.dao.dataintegrityviolationexception loading type mapping

sql missing or illegal character following the escape character java nested exception is missing or illegal character following the escape character java at not strictly a dbloader issue but gap is violating its pk index on when it tries to insert an empty string into the column
actually ora translates the empty string to a null thereby violating the constraint

trace java exception in thread main cannot insert null into uni java caused by cannot insert null into uni java at more jdbctypemaskfilter constructor leaks resultsets clob columns will not work reliably in ora without special handling

for example java error executing sql insert into locale values with values test web applications of type java org.springframework.jdbc.uncategorizedsqlexception preparedstatementcallback uncategorized sqlexception for sql insert into locale values sql state null error code invalid column type nested exception is invalid column type java at

summary: build process needs to recognize and as separate directories
description: when you start tomcat you see environment variables that get set and these point to the same directory most of the time
however they can point to different directories
should point to the base of your tomcat install
this would be the bin common and server directories at a minimum
the can point to a separate set of directories that would include the shared temp work and webapps directory
this allows multiple instances of tomcat hence multiple hosts to be running different applications on the same machine
see for additional information
the current deployment process is not aware of this convention
and most of the time it doesn't have to be
however we have our tomcat instances on our workstations and servers set up so that we have separate and directories
right now we have only directory we can set in build.properties for the deployment process usually sever.home is set to point to and most of the time that's ok

but when the portal initialized the jars that belong in the common directory get copied there when they really belong under i propose that a server.base property be introduced in to out of the box this should just point to but it would give those who need it the ability to set it to a different value
the affected properties in build.proerties would be the affected targets in build.xml would be deploy and dist

introduction of additional catches seems to indicate that really the intent here is to apply recovery regardless of what may go wrong
try portletstatemanager.clearstate(windowimpl catch illegalstateexception ise ignore an illegal state when the portletstatemanager tries to access the session if it has already been destroyed
log.info attempted to clear state for window windowimpl but ise indicates session had already been destroyed
ise catch exception e no matter what went wrong clearing state nothing we can do about it and desirable to recover and continue the workflow
log.error error clearing state for window windowimpl e

summary: provide default sort order for coaching history report

summary: dead end when searching for deactivated ea routing person
description: the person association for ea routings is handled a bit differently than most all other it's a text box that hits a search api
the idea i guess is that you should be able to pick anybody as a ea routing even though the campus ea coordinator must be a i'm not sure that's right but if it is it presents special problems

deactivated users don't work quite right assign a user to a ea routing deactivate the user edit the ea routing the deactivated user will still be correctly displayed as the routing's person add a character to the person's name delete it hit enter to try to trigger search it will find no results try to save the form you will receive an error that person is a required field
have to cancel out losing any other edits
might be able to fix this with a bit more logic in the save handling or it might be simpler to switch to the same combo box that ea campus management uses

on the topic of which users should be selectable in this field i would point out that while it might be a fine idea to try to allow end users to pick anybody not just coaches for ea routings our current person model doesn't support this very well since search operations only query the person table not external_person nor any more broadly scoped directory service
so if you're trying to pick a non-administrative user you're very unlikely to find them and the original design intent is probably lost
so maybe before we do anything we need to revisit the functional goal for this particular form field

summary: map adjust is transcripted indicator for term matching

that wouldn't be term based
new color planned course is on the transcript but not the same term as the transcripted course

summary: add support for setting render time out value
description: added initial support for render time out values for the portlets
these values are ultimately obtained for a specific portlet window by the rendering classes however may be defined at much earlier stages even at portlet deployment
since portlet deployment is now limited to the standard portlet.xml schema there is no easy way to provide support for that btw

any ideas on how portlet/application definitions can be extended in a standard-tolerant way we should provide support for defining timeout values during publish and perhaps added appropriate methods to the iportletinformationprovider and iportletinformationprovidercontrol get and setrendertimeoutvalue the portletdeploymenttransferimpl simply sets the value to an undefined value implying that the rendering framework should use default timeout
to provide a way for controlloing timeout values at publish subscribe we need to extend portlet definition and portlet entity implementations to keep track of a timeout value

this means adding timeout value to the appropriate transfer object extending dao to handle persistance of that value modifying definition/entity domain object implementations to make use of the redefined values

summary: portlet administrator portlet
description: this portlet will allow a portal administrator to the deployment of a portlet application

it should allow the administrator to map custom user attributes window states and portlet modes to uportal-specific user attributes window states and portlet modes for portlets within a portlet application
it should also allow the administrator to publish and manage portlet definitions along with their portlet definition-level portlet preferences

summary: portlet deployment mechanism
description: uportal needs a tool to deploy portlet applications

the first iteration of this tool can be a simple command line tool which could be launched from an ant task as we have in uportal alternatively and preferably we could make uportal detect new or changed portlet applications present in the servlet container webapps directory and automatically deploy them
deployment is a matter of exploding the war file and the web.xml file so that each portlet has an corresponding servlet wrapper
this is necessary for the pluto container to dispatch requests to its portlets

summary: cyclic reference between nodes causes aggregatedlayout.getfirstsiblingnode getlastsiblingnode never to return
description: i discovered this problem when i noticed that the cpu usage was at a constant after a load test despite the fact the load test had completed and nothing else was using the portal
with yourkit and remote debugging i was able to pinpoint the cause
there appears to be an issue with corrupt aggregated layouts where the previousnodeid of a set of nodes all reference one another
references creating a cyclic reference
this causes a problem when invocating aggregatedlayout.getfirstsibling since the for loop will never complete as previd will never be null

this looks like a reasonably simple thing to fix by making sure previd nodeid after previd node.getpreviousnodeid on line of aggregatedlayout.java however it doesn't address the issue of corrupt layouts
nick

summary: fix cassecuritycontextmocktest to cope with casproxyticketacquisitionexception deriving from runtimeexception
description: cassecuritycontextmocktest has exception handling flow that assumed and required that casproxyticketacquisitionexception a subclass of portalexception not derive from runtimeexception
since portalexception is now a runtimeexception casproxyticketacquisitionexception now subclasses runtimeexception so the class stopped compiling
trivially fixed

summary: incorrect syntax in ldapgroupstore.dtd
description: return all members of the first entity set minus any that occur in the rest element subtract should be return all members of the first entity set minus any that occur in the rest element subtract

summary: sybsqlexception thrown while updating column width
description: a sybsqlexception is thrown while updating column width
this occurs because all values for are enclosed within single quotes even though the column is defines as an integer
the exception is caused by implicit conversion from datatype varchar to int is not allowed
use the convert function to run this query
the table has other columns defined as integer but only the value is enclosed in quote
the fix is to remove all quotes when entering values for this occurs in places

summary: contains doesn't always work for pags groups
description: in group services where group membership for entities is computed by testing the prospective entity member rather than by testing the group pags ientitygroup.contains and deepcontains always work
if a pags group has been initialized by calling getmembers then calling contains or deepcontains for a prospective entity member will always return false
this is because groups in entity testing services do not keep references to their members they only define the logic for computing if an entity is a member or not
the fix is to have these services use an ientitygroup implementation that answers contains by testing the entity not the group

summary: ability to purge xslt cache

summary: linux ci configuration to deploy for and execute api integration tests
description: the proposed idea splits the jenkins build into a build ssp build and deploy and execute api tests clean up the pipeline plugin is probably overkill
for now we can probably get by with simple job chaining
database reset and a http health check to make sure the app is up will probably be part of step this probably means it will involve a certain amount of shell scripting
initialization of integration test data might be part of step or step and probably warrants additional discussion

for now we'll target but we'll eventually need a similar pipeline for the time being we'll likely need to reuse the existing linux ci env which will mean that at a minimum we need to keep the qa and integration testing databases separate because the data in the qa db is not throwaway
step would reset a db specific to integration testing deploy the app in a configuration that connects to that db then step would or restart the app in a configuration that connects to the qa db
this could all theoretically be done in a single job esp if we're talking only about testing ssp in standalone mode
but we want these integration tests in ci to be as realistic as possible hence the as the second step

it should be possible to execute the integration tests themselves against an arbitrary deployment given that the deployment has the data to support the tests of this probably means a maven integration test bootstrapping failsafe plugin probably should be isolated into a maven profile and that the coordinates for the application server under test should be overridable via system properties
let's not worry too much about aggregating test coverage metrics or even success/failure metrics at this time

summary: mail exception error for student intake
description: this issue has been prevalent in previous versions including this issue is caused by a blank primary email address in person table and blank recipient email addresses in the message table
the log file will fill up with mailservice exceptions that is hard to decipher and points to a java method

this java method has a place where the email address is checked for primary for the sender but then it doesn't do it for other email addresses recipient and the person so for consistency and to cut down on the log file size as well as for more description to the user this ticket deals with adding guards for this exception and outputting a more descriptive message so the problem can be rectified by end users

to be sure this issue is rare due to address not null conditions via the server code however in new integrations or other situations where there is no valid email address this will fill up the log quickly
other situations includes external

summary: caseload search without any filters times out
description: caseload search perf is definitely improved since addressing the issue with program status loading but still able to reliably time out the ui in linux ci by not specifying any search params at all

i see the cpu on the is pegged for the entire wait and roughly thereafter guessing until the queries run their and some fairly reasonable searches i think anyway like programstatus=active take much longer than a normal user is likely to wait get twitchy finger and make the problem worse

i imagine we could do something to require at least one filter before executing a search would have to be both front and of the server resource usage issue but still a since we never really know what combo of filters will narrow results down enough to not end up in what amounts to a potential dos person searches i think are always going to be potentially much larger than say reference item i really think these results need to be paged somehow or else dramatically simplified or precalculated or something
could still be room for improvement just by looking at query plans and profiler output
paging of course might not actually help at all the issue here seem to be data on the wire back to the client
query execution and deserialization time on the server
and for paging to work as currently designed the db has to know how many total records there are in the entire result set
so we might end up running the same or more of the awful query were we to try to fix this with the usual pagination mechanism
interestingly this time around almost all the cpu time is in postgres
previously with the program status it was in the java process

currently our transactions span the entire job which can lead to some very long running transactions

summary: display some sort of number in ui
description: request from spc

summary: caseload assignment always loads oldest appointment creating the impression recent appointment edits were lost
description: maybe there are more obvious paths for creating multiple appointments but this was how i discovered this behavior while working on click the button to create a new student retrieve a student record by external id assign required fields including appointment coordinates press save click yes in the dialog overwrite whatever is in the db already for that external id
if the student did not already have an appointment in the db repeat steps now have at least two appointments in the db for this student
select the student for edit
see the oldest appointment not the one you most recently edited
press save again
select the student for edit again
now see the appointment you had originally expected to see in repeat the appointments will each time

i think this happens for at least three reasons only the last of which is definitely wrong the overwrite option in step results in creation of a new appointment rather than updates to any existing saving the form always updates the on the appointment even if no changes were actually made and i think the sort order is wrong in appointmentdao.getcurrentappointmentforperson even when compared to the associated inline comment only return the most recently modified appointment modifieddate i think that should be order.desc so you always see whatever you edited most recently

not sure whether anything should really be done about the first what are the chances the user actually wants to overwrite an existing appointment for the second it seems like appointment should only have the modification timestamp updated if they are actually changed but the impact of the current behavior is mitigated entirely by just fixing the last issue incorrect sort

summary: as a admin user i would have the ability to the access types and roles for students
description: getting the user control to accept different variable types for user attributes

summary: move all variables out of the global scope
description: move the and other global variables out of the global scope and make them private static variables of the phpcas class
this will prevent poorly written client applications from accessing the object created via and ensure that even public methods on the are not accidentally considered part of the public api

summary: support for proxied post requests
description: currently only supports get requests limiting its utility for proxying authentication to i propose the addition of methods that would allow at least post requests and potentially other types of http requests if needed to be sent to web services
one option is the addition of a body headers output if needed additional methods for the delete options put and other http request types could be added
an alternate track would be to add a single url body headers output method where the type could be get post delete put etc

summary: implement support for cas proxy authentication
description: implement cas proxy support
we should provide at least proxy ticket storage for this task and ideally sql storage if time and resources permit

summary: browser based service validation
description: at present the client is able to use proxy tickets to authenticate
it would be useful if it could also take service tickets and redirect a page to the cas server if there was no ticket

summary: configure classes with gap service beans
description: the purpose of the package is to provide backwards compatibility in a future release of via adaptors run calls against gap service impls
this involves removing the gap service facades from and replacing them with a spring-configured service injector
this class will inject gap service beans into static access service classes in these classes implement a new interface which obligates them to a setservice method

in authorizationservicefacade deleted entitycachingservicefacade deleted entitylockservicefacade deleted entitytypesfacade deleted gapapplicationcontextfacade deleted groupservicefacade deleted sequencegeneratorfacade deleted gapapplicationcontextlocator springbeanlocator new in iservicecontainer new in authorizationservice entitycachingservice entitylockservice groupservice sequencegenerator in properties configures service facades

summary: replace references to spring service facades in group service with injected sevice beans
description: replace references to spring service facades in group service with injected service beans

this requires changes to composite and component gorup service interfaces icompositegroupservice and iindividualgroupservice and their implementations referenceindividualgroupservice and referencecompositegroupservice

summary: must be able to declaratively configure composite group separator string
description: we must be able to declaratively configure the composite group key separator string the string that separates the nodes of the group key
it is currently in the compositeentityidentifier class
this is required by users of jitldap group store as well as some home grown group services that have the default period string embedded in group keys

summary: allow abandoned locks to be explicitly released
description: create api in the entity locking service to allow for explicitly unlocking an entity whose lock has been abandoned rather than having to wait until the lock expires
we spoke about this at the september developers meeting

summary: migrate authorization service from uportal
description: migrate from to create permission dao layer write unit tests for dao impls service and default permission policy
use icachefactory to provide principal cache
use spring to manage dependencies

summary: migrate group service components from uportal filesystem
description: migrate from to examine apache commons vfs see as possible abstraction layer for underlying filesystem
promising but sufficiently mature remove dependencies on group configuration from unit tests

summary: migrate group service components from uportal local
description: migrate local group store from to write dao layer unit tests spring bean definition

summary: migrate groups service core from uportal
description: migrate groups interfaces and composite group service reference implementation from to explore using spring to replace the composite service configuration xml document

summary: migrate entity caching service from uportal
description: migrate entity caching infrastructure from to required by groups and permissions services with potential for other use
create icache and icachefactory interfaces for underlying caches
write whirlycache wrapper and factory
write icache implementation that uses a strict lru algorithm as opposed to a algorithm
create dao layer for entitycacheinvalidations
write unit tests for daos strictlrucache entitycache and invalidatingentitycache
create spring bean definitions for caching components

summary: migrate entity types service from uportal
description: migrate entity types infrastructure from to extract interfaces for entityidentifier and entitytypes write dao layer unit tests spring bean definition

summary: common gap services create sequence generator service
description: migrate sequence generator from to a sequence service is required by the following entity types entity caching and the local group service
create dao layer unit tests and spring bean definition

implementation refactor html and css for each view of the administrative portlet
enhance map external data model for phase
wire transcript-related ui components api
